Fireweed Bow.Description: A lightweight bow fashioned from fireweed. Fairly sturdy. The steel is warm to the touch, almost pulsing.

Scrap Metal Dagger.Description: A dagger fashioned from loose scraps.

Thorn Cutter.Description: A blade forged from steel centuries ago. Abandoned in the flower field, it has felt natures embrace, growing long, jagged thorns.

Flower Staff.Description: It's really just a long stick with a flower on it, but in a mage's hands, it'll do the job.

Broad Sword.Description: The blade seems to thirst for blood. The heavy blade feels light, and the leather grip cold. It feels almost as if it were dancing in your hands.
